channel.title: NYS:DECK on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:DECK on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Deckers Sales Soar on Demand for Ugg and Hoka Brand Footwear
item.description: Fuzzy Ugg boots and chunky Hoka running shoes saw big sales gains last quarter, bolstering financial results for parent company Deckers Outdoor Corp.
